ChangeList.Description: Added the **secretReferenceValueId** property to the [omaSetting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-omaSetting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **nfcBlocked** property to the [iosGeneralDeviceConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-iosGeneralDeviceConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **disconnectOnIdle** property to the [appleVpnConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-appleVpnConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **disconnectOnIdleTimerInSeconds** property to the [appleVpnConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-appleVpnConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **windowsPlatformBinaryTable** property to the [windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **simultaneousMultiThreading** property to the [windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **advancedThreatProtectionRequiredSecurityLevel** property to the [macOSCompliancePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-macOSCompliancePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [getOmaSettingPlainTextValue](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/intune-deviceConfiguration-getOmaSettingPlainTextValue?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [deviceConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the **dataProtectionBlockDirectMemoryAccess** property in the [windows10GeneralConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windows10GeneralConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from required to optional.
